title: Is it just me or is the has the server shat itself.

replies.body: Just got leaver buster (low priority) for not being able to connect to one game.... awesome...
WTF RITO FIX YOUR FKN SHT
No it's not just you. The server kicked me for 35 minutes in a ranked game. Needless to say I was reported for something riot caused.

You guys may need to try a connection KB to get the issue fixed: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues It may be a pain in the keaster but this will more than likely help you with the issue. It helped me when I had the same issue. {{champion:25}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:1026}}
Bump. can't enter games, servers are buggered
DC 5x in a game is NOT OK....it doesnt even RC..just stits there doing fuck all. I have to close client and reconnect every time to get back in my game for like 4 mins till it dcs me again.
Ban me for leaving this game and im going to come to your studios and take a fucking hammer to your servers. It might help.
